title: Add a more obvious “send love” flying hearts animation

requirements.text: Add a clearly noticeable “send love” flying hearts animation that triggers when the user clicks/taps the Hero CTA button labeled exactly “I LOVE YOU ❤️”. The hearts must visibly fly upward (a romantic burst/fountain feel) and remain smooth on mobile.

quotes: I  ALSO WANT THAT SEND SEND LOVE HEART FLYING ALSO

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking/tapping the “I LOVE YOU ❤️” button reliably triggers an on-screen hearts-flying-up animation.
The hearts animation is visually obvious (not too subtle) and lasts long enough to be noticed before it disappears.
Animation performance remains smooth on mobile (no major jank; no blocking interactions).

requirements.text: Update the existing hearts effect implementation used by the Hero section so it feels like “sending love” from the user interaction (e.g., increased heart count/intensity and/or originating near the button area) while preserving the existing WhatsApp redirect behavior.

quotes: I  ALSO WANT THAT SEND SEND LOVE HEART FLYING ALSO

acceptanceCriteria: The WhatsApp deep link still opens as it does today when “I LOVE YOU ❤️” is clicked.
The hearts effect is triggered immediately on click/tap and visually reads as a “send love” action (more intense/clear than before).
No regressions to other effects/components (Question Journey effects continue working as before).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Do not fetch images/assets through the backend; keep effects purely frontend.
nonGoals: Adding new backend canister logic or persistence for effects.
Changing the WhatsApp phone number or pre-filled message.
